ghost - package ghost
 
Ghost - Class in ghost
Provides generic functionality for a ghost, which is then used to create the specific behaviour of the ghost types.

ghostType - Enum in ghost
Provides image filenames and Sprites for the different ghost types.

tick(App) - Method in class ghost.Ambusher
The tick method is run once every frame, it calculates the target location depending on the ghost's mode, then chooses a direction to move in and moves forwards.
tick(App) - Method in class ghost.Chaser
The tick method is run once every frame, it calculates the target location depending on the ghost's mode, then chooses a direction to move in and moves forwards.
tick(App) - Method in class ghost.Ghost
 
tick(App) - Method in class ghost.Ignorant
The tick method is run once every frame, it calculates the target location depending on the ghost's mode, then chooses a direction to move in and moves forwards.
tick(App) - Method in class ghost.Waka
Toggles whether the mouth is open every 8 frames, checks if moving forward in the current direciton would collide with a wall, if the waka can turn to it's next direciton, checks for collisions with ghosts, collects any fruit and moves the waka forward.
tick(App) - Method in class ghost.Whim
The tick method is run once every frame, it calculates the target location depending on the ghost's mode, then chooses a direction to move in and moves forwards.
